attributes.action: Give out full life sentences to people who cause death by drink driving and should not be allowed any amount of alcohol before getting into a car
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This petition relates, albeit indirectly, to an invidual case.  Please re-draft this into a request for a change in general Government policy as we cannot host petitions that relate to individual cases.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
